Projects

Blockey Hockey

Technologies: Angular, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, Java, REST, MySQL, Github Pages

Since December 2014

  • What started out as a simple command block-based Minecraft mini-game, Blockey Hockey has evolved into a full-stack, Java-developed Minecraft plugin using the Spigot/Paper API. Today, the game is accompanied by a website and has fully automated, in-game stat tracking.

Drag and Drop Greenhouse

Technologies: Angular, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, Gridster API

August - November 2021

  • While working at DiD Integration Inc., a client requested a solution for their inventory management/location problem. The goal was to programmatically manage hundreds of greenhouses by importing pallets with the ability to reorder the pallets by dragging and dropping. Ease-of-use and efficiency was a top priority.
